title: Rubella
creator_contributor_role: Rubella Committee Deafness Foundation of Victoria, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Teenage girls
description: Designed to inform pubescent and teenaged girls of the need to vaccinate against German measles to prevent rubella in the unborn child. Outlines the congenital defects caused by rubella in the first six weeks of pregnancy. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
